sentences.en: A high communal intelligence quotient does not always, It'seems, insure communal efficiency.
sentences.cn: 社区中的高智商似乎并不总能确保社区的效能.

sentences.en: An insurance company will insure your life.
sentences.cn: 保险公司可以给你保寿险.

sentences.en: Check your work to insure its accuracy.
sentences.cn: 检查一下你的工作,以保证它的准确性.

sentences.en: facilities to insure the safety of cyclists
sentences.cn: 确保骑车人安全的设施

sentences.en: For protection against unforeseen emergencies, you insure your house, your furnishings and your car.
sentences.cn: 为了防范不可预见的紧急情况，人们给房子、家具和汽车上保险。

sentences.en: Have you insured the contents of your home?
sentences.cn: 你给家庭财产投保了吗？

sentences.en: I want to insure my house.
sentences.cn: 我要为自己的住宅保险.

sentences.en: Insure your baggage before you leave home.
It is advisable to insure your life against accident.
sentences.cn: 最好参加人寿保险,以防意外.

sentences.en: Measures must be taken to insure traffic safety.
sentences.cn: 必须采取措施保证交通安全.

sentences.en: More care would insure you against making so many mistakes.
sentences.cn: 多加注意就能保证你不犯这么多的错误了.

sentences.en: Please insure the goods for 110 % of the invoice value.
sentences.cn: 请按发票金额110%给这批货物投保.

sentences.en: They concentrated a superior force to insure against defeat.
sentences.cn: 他们为保证不致失败,集中了优势兵力.

sentences.en: Think carefully before you insure against accident, sickness and redundancy.
sentences.cn: 在为意外事故、疾病与失业投保之前一定要考虑清楚。

sentences.en: We automatically insure your belongings against fire and theft.
sentences.cn: 我们自动为您的财产上失窃险和火灾险。

sentences.en: Will it insure success to [ for ] you?
sentences.cn: 这将保证你成功 吗 ?

sentences.en: You should insure your packages against loss and damage.
sentences.cn: 你的邮包应保险以免遗失或损坏.

words.tran_cn: 保险；保险费；保险契约；赔偿金
确保；给…保险（insure的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tran_cn: 投保，承保，使采取预防措施
trans.tran_en: to buy insurance so that you will receive money if something bad happens to you, your family, your possessions etc

trans.tran_cn: 上保险， 给…保险； 保证， 确保
trans.tran_en: to buy insurance so that you will receive money if something bad happens to you, your family, your possessions etc
